law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 341, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 7. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 1. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Jurisdiction to appoint special committee to receive funds from governmental agency for support of indigents.
metadata.note: .1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 150 would have repealed this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1, 1982.
